text: Kirk William Caldwell (born September 4, 1952) is an American politician. He was the mayor of Honolulu, Hawaii from 2013 to 2021.Mayor Kirk Caldwell Re- Elected Over Charles Djou, Honolulu Civil Beat, Chad Blair, November 8, 2016. Retrieved 11 November 2016. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He unsuccessfully ran for Governor of Hawaii in 2022. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Honolulu Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa alumni
title: Kirk Caldwell
